participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, always cares for others and enjoys engaging in deep conversations.
participant_1.background: My dad is a college professor. I have purple hair. I am a petsitter. My mom died when I was six. My favorite book is The Tale of Genji.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Driven and competitive, loves sports and enjoys connecting with fans and teammates.
participant_2.background: I am an athlete. I get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball. I went to the University of North Carolina. I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Wolves. I play basketball.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1.
Hi, my name is participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm an athlete.
Oh, what kind of athlete?
I play basketball.
Cool! Do you play for a professional team?
Yes, I play for the Minnesota Timberwolves.
That's awesome! How did you get started in basketball?
I started playing when I was really young. My dad was a college professor and he was always encouraging me to play.
That's great. Did you go to college for basketball?
Yes, I went to the University of North Carolina.
Oh, that's a great school. Did you enjoy your time there?
Yes, I loved it. I played on the basketball team and I made some great friends.
That's awesome. So, how did you end up getting drafted by the Timberwolves?
I had a good season at UNC and I was projected to be a high pick in the draft. I was lucky enough to be selected by the Timberwolves.
That's awesome! So, what's it like being a professional athlete?
It's amazing. I get to play basketball for a living and I get to travel all over the country.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're really good at basketball.
I'm okay. I'm still learning.
Well, you're better than me. I've never played basketball before.
I'm sure you'd be good at it. You should give it a try.
I might do that. Thanks for talking to me.
No problem. It was nice talking to you.
